definition[0]: a film or television programme that is being shown again on television
example[0]: We watched a rerun of ‘I Love Lucy.’
definition[1]: something that happens in the same way as something that happened before
example[1]: The government wants to avoid a rerun of last year’s crisis.
definition[2]: to show a film or television programme again on television
definition[3]: to do something in the same way as before
definition[4]: to arrange for a race or competition to be held again
